name: win-count-by-artywoof
description: Win Counter for TikTok Live Streamers by ArtYWoof
author: ArtYWoof

scripts.dev:all: bun run dev:server & bun run dev:vite
scripts.test:overlay: start-server-and-test dev:all http://localhost:5173 bunx playwright test
scripts.seed:license: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$env:LICENSE_SECRET='13897ArtYWoof33!'; $mid=(Get-Content $env:LOCALAPPDATA'\Win Count by ArtYWoof\win_count_license.json' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Out-String); if(-not $mid){$mid='';}; Invoke-RestMethod -Method Post -Uri http://127.0.0.1:8765/admin/create -Headers @{Authorization='Bearer '+$env:LICENSE_SECRET} -ContentType 'application/json' -Body '{\"license_key\":\"TEST-123\",\"machine_id\":\"' + $mid + '\",\"duration_days\":30}'"
scripts.release:patch: bun version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: bun version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: bun version major && git push && git push --tags
